entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 23 January 2023
